title: Esther Reed ////// 212
description:
Esther Reed ////// 212

Part 1 of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

She conned us all... it was 1999 in South Carolina. 20 year old Brooke Henson went for a walk. She was traveling two blocks on foot in the middle of the night. She intended to walk to a store and buy some cigarettes. She never made it. Before leaving she had left a note for her boyfriend. They had been arguing that night. Her parents last saw her walking from their home at 2:20 in the morning. They have not seen nor heard from her since. Then in 2004 Brook Henson took out $100,000 in student loans and enrolled at Columbia University in New York City. Beer of the Week - Identity Crisis by Mad Tree Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
